TopicTitle: Entanglement required to balance the universe

Articles.Content:
https://www.sciencenews.org/article/entanglement-gravitys-long-distance-connection?tgt=nr

So the basic ideal flows off the other thread, the theory of nothing, here you have our little universe in its single quantum state, something goes awry,

So how does the universe try to keep itself together, entanglement. gravity, which some are now saying is a quantum tunnel. These virtual particles interact via tunnels in space and entanglement is the process.

frankly i don't think the universe is doing a good job of holding itself together, it should do a whoops.
